column4: hey does anyone know how to unlock the upper panel in the netbook remix, please tell me.  XD  driving me crazy

i've tried - in Ubuntu UNE you really can't by default.  I've looked into potentially using a gconf setting to unlock it - but haven't found a working method yet.  Good luck though.  I believe the KDE UNE doesn't suffer this issue.
ok then.  i did try KDE UNE and it was buggy as heck
i don't do KDE stuff, so i never even downloaded it
